thread.title: Jose Mourinho fumes as Manchester United’s FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved to Monday night on Europa League week
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho fumes as Manchester United’s FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved to Monday night on Europa League week

author: sstreet
title: Jose Mourinho fumes as Manchester United’s FA Cup clash with Chelsea is moved to Monday night on Europa League week
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JOSE MOURINHO has vented his fury after Man United’s FA Cup quarter-final at Chelsea was moved to a Monday night. 
The Red Devils face a Europa League last 16 clash three days later and the Special One is worried that his side could end up with a long-distance away trip. Getty Images 4 Jose Mourinho has fumed after Man United’s FA Cup tie at Chelsea was moved to a Monday night for coverage on BBC 
He said: “I feel really surprised that the decision is made before our draw in Europe, because at this moment nobody knows where we play, where the first and second matches are. 
Keep up to date with ALL the MANCHESTER UNITED news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
“Imagine we play Chelsea on Monday and go to the second match in Europe in Russia, Turkey or Greece? 
“I think once more the interests are going in front of the clubs and English football’s interests, and nobody cares about it.” 
But he added that no matter what happens he will not field a severely weakened side at Stamford Bridge. AP:Associated Press Henrikh Mkhitaryan fired United into the Europa League last 16 PA:Press Association And Jose Mourino says he owes it to the supporters to send a full strength team to Chelsea Times Newspapers Ltd 4 Mourinho criticised Manuel Pellegrini for sending a young Man City team to Stamford Bridge in similar circumstances last season 
Mourinho commented: “I cannot play against Chelsea with the second team, I cannot play Chelsea with the U21s like Manchester City did last year. 
“I cannot do that. We are Manchester United . 
“I don’t do that as Manchester United manager. 
“I don’t do that to the FA Cup because the FA Cup is not guilty of these decisions. Manchester United fans reply to the dancing St Etienne fans during away leg in France 
“The FA Cup is beautiful, the competition is historical. 
"I have to treat Manchester United supporters and the FA Cup in the right way. 
“I cannot go there with U21s. Probably they would deserve it but I don’t do that. 
“So what is going to happen is an accumulation of matches. People playing a lot of matches. Related Stories EXIT DOOR OPENS Man United defender Daley Blind set for summer exit as Jose eyes Victor Lindelof as replacement It's not cheap Jose tells Luke Shaw he is down United pecking order and getting into first team will be 'expensive' ROO MAY GO Wayne Rooney's Man United career could be over as Jose Mourinho refuses to guarantee he won't leave for China this month LUKE WHO'S DROPPED Paul Pogba, Bastian Schweinsteiger and Jose Mourinho all on Manchester United plane to St Etienne... but where's Luke Shaw? reds vs blues Gerrard's slip, 'Ghost Goal', Jose Mourinho and more among our seven classics as Liverpool-Chelsea clashes He offers mour than roo Jose promises Marcus Rashford more game time... so is it the end for Wayne Rooney? 'fame is s***' Dani Alves blasts 'disrespectful' Barca, Jose's 'dirty' Madrid and the effect football has on people 
"I have to make some rotation but some of the boys will have to play in all these consecutive matches." 
United got through to Friday's Europa League draw with Henrikh Mkhitaryan's goal securing a 4-0 aggregate win over Saint-Etienne. 
But Eric Bailly was controversially sent off and will miss the first leg in the last 16.
